Description: The Art of Flight: The film follows Travis Rice, John Jackson, Mark Landvik, Scotty Lago, Jake Blauvelt, Nicolas Muller, Gigi Ruf, DCP and Pat Moore as they venture out to the top of some of the most remote mountains in the world  places where humans have yet to go and definitely a place where nobody has ever snowboarded before. The footage theyve captured is insane......
Title: The-Art-of-Flight
